body.name: Hamilton Beach Countertop Air Fryer Oven with Sure-Crisp Technology, XL Capacity for 2 12” Pizzas, Two 9” x 13” Pans and 4 Rack Positions, Digital Controls, Grey (31390)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 41 mins
features: SURE-CRISP AIR FRY FUNCTION POWERFULLY CIRCULATES AIR AROUND FOOD FOR CRISPY RESULTS. : The Sure-Crisp air fry function* provides crisp, even browning with little to no oil, making it ideal for air frying chicken wings, fries, steak, fish and more.

AIR FRIES* 1 LB. OF FROZEN FRIES IN UNDER 15 MINUTES: With 1800 watts of power, this extra-large capacity air fryer oven will air fry a pound of frozen crinkle-cut fries to a golden crispy finish in less than 15 minutes.
COOKS A FULL MEAL IN LESS THAN 20 MINUTES: Whether you're making flatbread pizzas or a baked chicken, this versatile oven air fryer combo will help you get dinner on the table faster.

EASY-TO-USE DIGITAL CONTROLS FOR EXCELLENT RESULTS: Go from air frying crispy chicken wings on Monday to baking brownies on Sunday. This large oven has 6 cooking modes — air fry, bake, convection bake, broil, roast and keep warm, plus a Stay On function.

EXTRA-LARGE CAPACITY FOR ALL YOUR FAVORITE FOODS: The countertop oven has plenty of room for cooking all your favorite foods. It fits a whole 5 lb. chicken, two 12" pizzas, 2 lb. of french fries or two 9" x 13" pans without handles.
*Air fry function may require more cooking time than standalone air fryers.
body.description: The Hamilton Beach® Sure-Crisp® XL Digital Air Fryer Oven powerfully circulates air around food for delicious, crispy results. It air fries* 1 lb. of frozen, crinkle-cut fries in under 15 minutes and cooks a full meal in less than 20 minutes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Get dinner on the table faster The Hamilton Beach Sure-Crisp XL Digital Air Fryer Oven is both powerful and fast. With 1800 watts of power, it air fries 1 lb. of frozen, crinkle-cut fries to a golden crispy finish in under 15 minutes and cooks a full meal in less than 20 minutes.

Hamilton Beach products are thoughtfully designed to make your life easier. We use consumer insights and in-depth research to deliver the best solution to your everyday needs. Whether it's preparing delicious meals and beverages effortlessly, or making your clothes look their best, you can count on the brand that has spent over 100 years creating products with you in mind. Hamilton Beach Sure-Crisp XL Digital Air Fryer Oven With the Sure-Crisp air fry function,* air powerfully circulates around food for crisp, even browning with little to no oil. This oven is perfect for air frying chicken wings, french fries, steak, fish, vegetables and more. The oven has digital controls that are easy to use and 6 cooking modes — air fry, bake, convection bake, broil, roast and keep warm, plus a Stay On function. With precise temperature control, the oven cooks evenly without hot spots at temperatures ranging from 150 to 450º F. The extra-large capacity oven has room for cooking all your favorite foods. Easy-to-use digital controls for excellent results Cooks a full meal in less than 20 minutes 4 Rack Positions Includes 5 accessories: a chrome-plated mesh air fry basket, enamel bake pan, 2 removable oven racks and a removable crumb tray Fits a whole 5 lb. chicken, two 12" pizzas, 2 lb. of french fries or two 9" x 13" pans without handles

Sure-Crisp Air Fry Function Powerfully Circulates Air Around Food for Crispy Results The Sure-Crisp air fry function* provides crisp, even browning with little to no oil, making it ideal for air frying chicken wings, French fries, steak, fish, vegetables and more. *Air fry function may require more cooking time than standalone air fryers. Air Fries* 1 Lb. of Frozen Fries in Under 15 Minutes With 1800 watts of power, this extra-large capacity oven will air fry a pound of frozen, crinkle-cut fries to a golden crispy finish in less than 15 minutes. Cooks a Full Meal in Less Than 20 Minutes Whether you're making flatbread pizzas or a baked chicken, this versatile oven will help you get dinner on the table faster.

Easy-to-Use Digital Controls for Excellent Results Go from air frying crispy chicken wings on Monday to baking brownies on Sunday. This large oven has 6 cooking modes — air fry, bake, convection bake, broil, roast and keep warm, plus a Stay On function. Extra-Large Capacity for All Your Favorite Foods The oven has plenty of room for cooking all your favorite foods. It fits a whole 5 lb. chicken, two 12" pizzas, 2 lb. of french fries or two 9" x 13" pans without handles. Includes 5 Accessories This oven includes a chrome-plated mesh air fry basket, enamel bake pan, 2 removable oven racks and removable crumb tray. The mesh basket lets air circulate around food for even browning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It works very stable and easy to learn. Really roomy! Convenient and pleasant to work with. I recommend both the product and the seller!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really love the oven I know it's not a toaster oven it's kind of what I was looking for I would have given it five stars but here's the thing when I went when I go to bake something I have to put it on say 10 minutes take it out 10 minutes less time then what the directions say and say if something is supposed to be baking at 3:50 I have to put it at 3:25 but it does work really good I really like using it a lot it's just I have to get used to the temperature and time changes on it other than that I'm fine I'm asthmatic so I had to have my gas cook stove removed from the housing authority because it was affecting my asthma and this product works really good for me as a temporary stand in oven until the housing authority finds me a new apartment with an electric stove but all in all I like it a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for frozen pizza.
reviews.reviewText: Remember to measure your space before ordering this & take into account that the electrical cord is only 26 inches long & attached to the bottom right-hand corner on the back. Even though I measured to make sure I had enough space, I still had to install a power strip to be able to plug this in bc of the ridiculously short cord (a trend I've noticed that says it's for safety, but actually makes things less safe bc it necessitates the use of an extension cord).As for function, I really like the way it cooks. My husband & grandson love frozen pizza for my grandsons after school snack & he says this cooks them better than even my convection oven & it doesn't heat up the kitchen as much.Bacon & hamburgers are also standouts.Toast wasn't worth the effort, my dash visible toaster does a better job, easier.Vegetables have been hit & miss, still working on my technique, time & temperature with these.Cleaning is fairly easy, I covered the bottom tray with foil, I also cover the solid tray with foil & use a parchment liner to aid clean-up. I do find that the grease that hits the door will run down it & drip on the counter under it as well as cling to the bottom of the door.I wish I had noticed in the description that it does not have a light inside or a handle thingy to pull out the racks & tray. I'm not taking this off for that though bc it's not the products fault that I miss those details.I would purchase this again & recommend it to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the best quality control...
reviews.reviewText: I've only had this toaster oven for about a week and I will certainly update this review if it should fail on me at some point soon.I've gone through many toaster ovens over the years, every single one has always come with an inaccurate dial, hated it. Was determined this time to find a digital one. I'm happy with my selection, it's living up to my expectations at the moment.Previous to this toaster oven I had a PowerXL, it's heating element was amazing in the beginning but it's slowly wore out over time.. and the temperature it cooked at was wildly inaccurate, it suddenly stopped heating food randomly, I would come back to my food after the timer dinged and it would be completely cold. I got rid of it and I don't miss it.So more about this Hamilton Beach toaster oven. Right off the bat the things I noticed once I get it on my counter.. the legs are uneven so it wobbles and the front panel was not attached properly so the top right corner has an uneven look. I was afraid to damage it so I didn't attempt to put it back on myself, it feels stuck anyway.. so of course the first thing I think is their quality control is lacking... The last thing I noticed is sometimes while it's cooking the fan can get obnoxiously loud, if you move the toaster oven just slightly it will quiet down immediately.. hoping in the future this isn't going to be a problem.What I really like is the fact that this allows you to preheat before the timer begins. Every other toaster oven I've had begins the countdown once you turn the dial. Once it preheats then it beeps you put in the food, you hit start and then the countdown begins.Now this toaster oven is probably larger than any other toaster oven I've had, it does take up quite a bit of counter space. Which in turn likely does cause the preheating time to increase but I feel the pros outweigh the cons at the moment.My only pet peeve is with the design for the door coming down, because this toaster oven is longer the glass door comes down directly on the edge of my countertop.. the side swinging doors would have been a better design.Overall I really do like it, I just hope it outlives all the other toaster ovens that have failed on me over the years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this as a Christmas gift for my parents and they love it! Super easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars You've got to be kidding!
reviews.reviewText: Quite a disappointment. I wound up trying this product after the return time had expired due to surgery on both hands. It stated that it was a toaster oven, but there is NO toaster setting! If you want toast, you have to broil it on one side and then flip it over. This is not a quick process, so don't plan on grabbing a quick bite of toast and then dashing off to the airport!!! Next there is NO light so you must pull out the rack to check for doneness. Finally, the door handle sits flush with the countertop when opened so if food has to go back in for more time, there is no good way to lift the door back up without getting burned. I would have returned it had it not been for the surgery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this to replace a large toaster oven and separate air fryer. I love that this is an all in one machine.
Perfceto. Y el precio fue justo. Aunq yo lo compré con descuento. Pero aún sin descuento lo compraría.
Me parece muy buen horno, calienta muy rápido. Es muy amplio, y aunque hasta ahora solo he usado la opción de Bake, ha funcionado muy bien =)

He pedido este producto dos veces. La primera vez llego con un error en la tarjeta al momento de poner el tiempo de horneado (el manual trae instrucciones antes del primer uso, segui las instrucciones y fue ahi cuando surgio el error). Marque al numero que viene en el manual. Ahi me dijeron que era un error en la tarjeta, me dieron dos opciones: llevarlo a reparación (costos que yo cubririra pese a que era NUEVO y recien llegado) o solicitar la devolución del dinero ya que NO te dan opcion de cambio de producto por uno nuevo. Solicite la segunda y pense que si lo volvia a comprar el segundo me llegaria bien. Pero NO!!! me mandaron uno nuevo pero con el mismo error!!! Ademas que esta vez el empaque llego dañado :(
